item.title: About
item.description:
Hi, I’m Ning Li — a data professional with a passion for transforming raw data into meaningful insights.

Currently, I’m a Data Analyst Intern at Sephora’s Retail Data Technology team, where I help migrate dashboards from Tableau to ThoughtSpot, validate data in Databricks, and ensure metric accuracy aligns with SLA standards. I thrive on building systems that help teams make smarter, faster decisions.

Previously, I gained hands-on experience at Amazon and NetEase, automating performance metric pipelines with Python, writing complex SQL queries, and building dashboards in Tableau and Power BI to support business operations.

item.title: Academic Experience
item.description: Degrees in Computer Science, Law, and Business from Northeastern, Northwestern, and Boston University

item.title: COVID-19 Global Dashboard
item.description: An interactive Tableau dashboard visualizing global COVID-19 confirmed cases and deaths over time with geospatial and trend visualizations.

item.title: Iris Dataset EDA
item.description: Exploratory Data Analysis of the classic Iris flower dataset using Python.

item.title: Movie Ratings, Genres & Financial Performance Analysis
item.description: An analysis of 45k+ movies exploring how genres, ratings, and budgets relate to ROI and audience approval using Kaggle’s Movies Dataset.

item.title: Pharmaceutical Data Pipeline & Sales Analysis
item.description: Built a complete data pipeline and analysis solution for a pharmaceutical sales system.

item.title: Predicting Online Advertising Click-Through Rates (CTR)
item.description: CTR prediction using structured features, TF-IDF text processing, and a weighted soft voting ensemble of ML models. Final model achieves 0.86 accuracy.

item.title: Professional Experience
item.description: Internships at Sephora, NetEase, and Amazon, focusing on data analytics, dashboard migration, automation, and business insights.

item.title: Skills
item.description: Proficient in SQL, Python, and R, with hands-on experience in data engineering, BI tools, dashboard development, and statistical analysis.
